sections.text: Each level has a local leaderboard. Whenever a player completes a level, they are prompted to save their score to that local leaderboard, using three initials (or any combination of 3 characters). This is stored in your local user data files. On Windows, that is %APPDATA%/uncontained. On Mac, that is ~/Library/Application Support/uncontained. On Linux, that is ~/.config/uncontained.
At the start of a level, the player starts with 10,000 points. Every second, the player loses 60 points. Collecting a coin grants 1,000 points, and the score cannot go below 0.
